message.content:
cs.CR, cs.CY, cs.SE, cs.LG, cs.DC

The paper discusses risks and transaction costs associated with distributed ledger fintech business models, which involve the use of smart contracts. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as it involves analyzing the risks associated with the use of smart contracts and distributed ledgers. Additionally, the paper discusses the unintended consequences of replicating traditional contract forms within the fintech environment, which could fall under the categories of cybernetics (cs.CY) and software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also discusses the economic implications of these business models, which could fall under the categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC).
